description.value: This plugin will return availablility and response time metrics for a single gomez test execution per run of the monitor.

property.label: Script Name
property.description:
Please enter the name of the script. It's not case sensitive, but it's recommended to include the script's full name.
Example: testweb.com - FF Agent

property.label: Username
property.description: Please enter a username for Gomez.

property.label: Password
property.description: Please enter a password for Gomez.

property.label: Debug
property.description: Turn on debugging if the script is failing. The output can be found in the polling collector's log file.

property.label: Proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used. If you enable this option, run the plugin on a dedicated collector.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy exclusions
property.description: Indicates the hosts that should be accessed without going through the proxy. Typically this defines internal hosts. The value of this property is a list of hosts, separated by the '|' character. In addition the wildcard character '*' can be used for pattern matching

property.label: Proxy authorization
property.description: If the HTTP proxy server requires a username and a password for access, proxy authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

metric.name: availability
metric.description: The availability as reported in Gomez for the last run.

metric.name: responseTime
metric.description: The response time as reported in Gomez for the last run.
